title: "U.S. Greenhouse Gas Center: Data Workflow Documentation"

Welcome to the [U.S. Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Center: Data Workflow Documentation](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter), your gateway to exploring and analyzing curated datasets on greenhouse gas emissions.

Discover the journey of each dataset with our detailed data workflows. Gain insights into how we handle and process data, from acquisition to analysis. Explore examples of data workflows for transparency and understanding of our rigorous processes.

Join us in our mission to make data-driven environmental solutions accessible.
Explore, analyze, and make a difference with the U.S. GHG Center.
